Posts.Content: Thank you for your replies. I put a gift bag together with a fleece blanket, magazines, mindfulness/journal/colouring book, coloured pencils, sherbet lemons, shortbread, high calorie snacks and a bottle of bubbly for when tretament is finished. She was pleased to have received it Newbie
Posts.Title: Supporting my SIL

Posts.Content: My sister in law is starting chemo and radio very soon. I want to put a kit together to make the treatment days a little less daunting and uncomfortable - can you ladies suggest anything you found specially useful or helpful ? My own hubby (her brother) is also being treated right now so want to look out for them both.  Going shopping today so no pressure ☺ Thanks all x
Posts.Title: Supporting my SIL
